title: Chainlink ($LINK) and Three Other Altcoins Outperforming Wider Market, Says Santiment
description: Chainlink ($LINK) and three other altcoins are poised for potential gains, powered by encouraging on-chain data, at a time in which the price of the flagship cryptocurrency Bitcoin ($BTC) is trading within a tight range between $26,000 and $27,000.
